Section.name: About JCT College of Engineering and Technology
Section.description:
JCT College of Engineering and Technology is a part of Jan Nayak Ch.Devi Lal Vidyapeeth. The College is a Self-financing; Non-Autonomous affiliated to renowned university.
The institution presently offers courses like Engineering B.Tech that are Computer Science Engg, Electronics and Communication Engg, Electronics and Electrical Engg, Mechanical Engg, Information Technology, Civil Engg., BME, Bio-Technology, Post Graduate Courses M.Tech.
